dict.string: MyFlama needs camera access to let you take photos and videos for sharing with friends. We only access your camera when you're actively using photo/video features.
MyFlama uses your location to show you on the map and help you discover nearby friends and events. Location is only used when you enable location sharing.
MyFlama uses your location to show you on the map and help you discover nearby friends and events. Location is only used when you enable location sharing.
MyFlama needs microphone access to record audio for videos and voice messages. We only access your microphone when you're actively recording.
MyFlama saves photos and videos you create to your photo library so you can keep them on your device. This permission is only used when you choose to save content.
MyFlama accesses your photo library so you can choose and share existing photos or videos with friends. We only access photos you specifically select.
MyFlama needs access to your media library so you can select and play music in videos and stories. We only access music you specifically choose.
